title: ID help please!
content:
Hi there, can anybody help me out by identifying the typeface used for the word FLOW at all?

Thanks in advance, Moonblob

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015031148im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Flow_Logo_CMYK_5357.gif)

Apologies for the subject title, I have no idea how to describe the font.
author: moonblob

comments.content: It's probably a modified version of Futura Bold or custom-made.
Indeed. Consider [Co](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015031148/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Co), a face with this kind of curved end stroke built in.
